text:
(1)
Coney Island Beach, looking south from Seaside Park, between Ocean Parkway and West 5th Street, showing the Coney Island Boardwalk, under construction.

June 3, 1922.

Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

(2)
The same, looking eastward, showing Parkway Baths in the center of view.

August 1924.

Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

(3)
The same, showing at the left, the remains of the Brighton Beach Hotel.

August 1924.

(4)
The same, looking northeast from about West 5th Street. Seaside Park is in the background.

August 1924.

Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
title: Islands - Coney Island beach - [Seaside Park.]

text:
Concourse Drive, north side, west of Ocean Parkway, showing at the N.W. corner a shelter house in Sea Side Park.

January 1924.

Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

(1) Surf Ave., west from West 3rd Street, showing in the right foreground, a part of Seaside Park.

November 1924.

Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

(2) The same, showing more of Seaside Park in the foreground, on the north and south side of Concourse Drive.

November 1924.

Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
